name: I-LIVE-ON StoryTeller
summary: An ILO file is a story created and used by the I-LIVE-ON application suite, including I-LIVE-ON.Creator, I-LIVE-ON.NowStory, and I-LIVE-ON.VR-Theater. Typically, ILO stories are a record of a person's life and are Zip-compressed, containing audio, video, text, image, and GEnealogical Data COMmunications (GEDCOM) data.
